Content.Content:
[$BOX] [$CELL] [$BLOCK]

The priority of care is to maintain patency of the patient’s airway. In those who have sustained a mandibular fracture, edema, structural damage, saliva, and pooling blood can compromise the airway; therefore, suctioning the patient’s airway takes priority.

 

[$/BLOCK] [$/CELL] [$CELL] [$IMG("/media/Images/shutterstock_682508113.jpg";200,300)] [$/CELL] [$/BOX]
Content.Name: SAFE AND EFFECTIVE CARE ENVIRONMENT 372
